title: Like, the new URF sucks.
body:
Idk who was the one with the brilliant idea, but it is just not fun, it is  like "thinkof  a way to make it unfun" and you got with the random champs sh*t. 
It really ruins it all, i would much rather have the other urf, it is not fun getting vayne and the other team getting ezreal, lux and katarina, wtf. like the games are decided before it starts and you made not even a single decision on it! really bad. rito pls.

replies.body:
I don't even play urf for the "stomp or be stomped" teamcomps (hell thats just dynamic q season 6 ranked) but I play it just to test out and enjoy the champions I love to play regularly, even more. Win or lose, as long as I get to play my champion I'm having a blast and others are too unless they're that depressed about losing a rotational gamemode. 

I guess because riot doesn't want to just disable {{champion:238}} and {{champion:35}} and let us figure out our own problems with the 3 bans, some of us can't play more casual things for fun like {{champion:72}} {{champion:60}} {{champion:56}} in urf. 

Nope we get {{champion:157}} when we don't ask for him.
urf always sucked. it was overhyped because it was new, it was fresh, it was diffrent. now its stale, old, and stank. random or no random, its now overated.

This new URF's complete shit yeah; you either get a team comp via random and have a good time, or the opposite. With odds like that it makes the damn game less about skill and more about chance and luck; meaning they took away the elements League was iconic for.

I'm just glad after Monday it'll be gone forever, and we can go deal with Ascension or something; at least that was an actual game that people enjoyed. 

If this is the new URF forever, then URF's dead.

BROOOOOO IKR THIS NEW GAMEMODE SUCKS!!!! WHY WOULD RIOT DO THAT???
{{champion:28}}
